The city is known for its small town charm.
Cotati is easily accessible through Highway 101.
There is a bus system and several cabs, however most use personal vehicle. Cotati is a good town for walking and biking.

, all of which occur during the summer season.

Cotati is home to several bars, all within walking distance in the center of town. Thursdays and the weekend are busiest nights, but there is a turn out for the Cotati Crawl all through the week (participants start at one end of downtown and drink their way to the other).
